articles.description: A Sonbhadra court sentenced BJP MLA Ramdular Gond to 25 years in jail for raping a minor girl in 2014. | Latest News India
articles.content: A Sonbhadra court on Friday sentenced Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) MLA Ramdular Gond to 25 years in jail for raping a minor girl in 2014. Gond, an MLA from the Duddhi seat in Sonbhadra district of Ut… [+1596 chars]
